Offer API¶

Offer manipulation API

class api.views.offer.OfferViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

Inherits standard characteristics from ModelViewSet:

Endpoint: /offers/
Methods: GET / POST / PUT / PATCH / DELETE / OPTIONS
Permissions:
- Default : IsJWTOwner
- GET : IsJWTAuthenticated
- POST : IsJWTSelfAndConcerned
model¶

alias of Offer
